snippet: The police say that a self-described escapist who once set a speed record for eating a household light bulb was charged with robbing six banks.
abstract: Magician Robert J Williams is arrested and charged with committing a string of Brooklyn bank robberies; police say that beyond the six robberies for which Williams is charged, he is suspected of robbing five other banks, including two in Manhattan within the last two months.
lead_paragraph: The police say that a self-described escapist who once set a speed record for eating a household light bulb was charged with robbing six banks.

headline.seo: Magician Arrested in Series of Brooklyn Bank Robberies
headline.main: Magician Arrested in Series of Brooklyn Bank Robberies
headline.print_headline: Magician Is Arrested in a Series of Brooklyn Bank Robberies
